messages.subject: Question about Oak Meadow
messages.messageBody:
Sorry; I deleted a post thinking it was coming to the Always Learning list. Perhaps someone here will be willing to assist with this question:


----------

From: "Rimma" <crystalmoondo....
Date: February 18, 2012 9:46:29 AM MST
To: UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Question about Oak Meadow School in Vermont


Hello Everyone!

I would like some information on Oak Meadow online school for homeschoolers in Vermont. If you are an unschooling family and have used this school online and would like to share your experience I would greatly appreciate it. I am very curious to know how the assessment of lower grade students takes place. I couldn't get any information on their website. Do they have tests, worksheet submission online, etc?
Thank You
Rimma and Harrison (almost 5) in NYC
